oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bill of sale
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bill of sale for one half of a negro boy named Tom ""about 22 years of age"" to Thomas Bradshaw in the amount of $450. Tom is being sold by Hugh Bradshaw.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bradshaw, Hugh
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Slavery; Enslavement; Ownership of Slaves; Slaveholding
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
